overview: After she marries Jack Valentine, Janie Wakefield discovers that her husband's reputation as a flirt is well deserved when she sees him riding in a taxi with a strange woman. Jaine sets out to remodel her husband into the man she wants.
tagline: A picture so jammed with laughs it will leave you limp. Written by a woman. Directed by a woman. Starring the funniest woman on the screen. Bring HIM!!!
title: Remodeling Her Husband
